organization_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the product.

created_at.description: The `Date-Time` that this product was created on the server.

organization_overview.description: A series of static fields about the product.

webhook_url.description: A URL to which events pertaining to your organization get posted

config.description: Configurations for API integrations within your organization.

name.description: The active issuer-processor for your organization.

valid_api_key.description: Indicates whether there is a valid API key configured for your issuer-processor.

name.description: The active payment processor for your organization.

repay_config.description: Indicates the details for Repay configuration, if available, for your organization.

valid_merchant_id.description: Indicates whether a valid merchant ID has been configured for your organization. The merchant ID itself is hidden from our response.
